titleStmt.title: Whereas by a clause contained in the act, intituled, an Act for the Explaining of Some Doubts Arising upon an Act, intituled, an Act for the Better Execution of His Majesties Gracious Declaration for the Settlement of his Kingdome of Ireland ... by the Lord Lieutenant and Council, Essex.
titleStmt.author: Ireland. Lord Lieutenant (1672-1677 : Essex)
Essex, Arthur Capel, Earl of, 1631-1683.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Benjamin Tooke ... and are to be sold by Joseph Wilde ...,

notesStmt.note: Title from first 5 lines of text.
Statement of responsibility transposed from head of title.
"Given at the Council chamber in Dublin the xxxth. day of June, one thousand six hundred seventy six"--leaf [2]
Reproduction of original in the Society of Antiquaries Library, London.
